TurnstileBanner.title: The best solutions for your access control
TurnstileBanner.content: Choose high-quality turnstiles for any area, tailored to your needs.

BannerList.title: Our Range
BannerList.text: We offer entrance security and control systems that allow you to:
list: Allow employees or authorized persons to enter using QR codes, RFID cards, FaceID devices, and fingerprint scanners.
Monitor employees' entry and exit dates and times.
Generate reports on employees' entry and exit data for different time periods (month, quarter, year).
Control visitor access with the ability to limit the number of entries. In addition, we implement other features and functionalities in the system according to the client's needs.

QrScanSection.title: QR code scanner
QrScanSection.description: If there is no opportunity or space to install a turnstile, we offer you the perfect solution: a QR scanning device that will make your space more organized and convenient.
advantages: Convenient and simple installation. The device is easily attached to the wall and does not take up unnecessary space.
Compact design: A minimalist solution that blends in with any interior.
Functionality: Fast and accurate QR code scanning for access control or other processes.
Cost-effective solution: Get the same effective control without the need to install a turnstile.

MadeInArmeniaSection.title: Made in Armenia
MadeInArmeniaSection.description: We offer a wide range of turnstiles that suit different needs and environments, from offices to high-traffic public areas. Our products are manufactured in Armenia, ensuring high quality and competitive prices. Turnstiles are suitable for both security and law enforcement. We also offer customized solutions to meet your requirements.

TurnstileInfoSection.title: Your Reliable Choice of Turnstiles
TurnstileInfoSection.description: The turnstiles are equipped with the latest technologies: card, QR code and facial recognition systems. They are made of high-quality materials, ensuring durability and long-term use. Our products provide easy installation, technical support and affordable prices to meet the needs of any business.

titles: These features make turnstiles an ideal solution for various areas to ensure safety and efficiency.
Our turnstile services, from sales to maintenance
Our company not only sells turnstiles, but also provides their professional maintenance, freeing you from technical problems and guaranteeing the uninterrupted operation of the equipment.
Track the entry and exit of your employees
Our turnstile systems allow you to easily and accurately track the entry and exit of your employees, providing a high level of control.

DeviceSection.titleTurnstilePage: You can also find us here.
DeviceSection.descriptionHomePage: We offer a wide range of security systems suitable for both homes and business premises.
DeviceSection.descriptionTurnstilePage: We offer a wide range of security systems suitable for both homes and business premises.

ContactSection.title: Fill in the fields to get a consultation.

questions.question: How can I control the security system from my phone?
questions.answer: Our app allows you to control all your devices from one platform. You can turn the alarm on or off, view live camera feeds, and receive alerts about threats.

questions.question: How does facial recognition technology work?
questions.answer: Մեր հավելվածը թույլ է տալիս վերահսկել բոլոր սարքերը մեկ հարթակից։ Կարող եք միացնել կամ անջատել ահազանգը, տեսնել տեսախցիկների կենդանի հոսքը և ստանալ ծանուցումներ վտանգի մասին։

questions.question: Can I manage systems in multiple locations at the same time?
questions.answer: Մեր հավելվածը թույլ է տալիս վերահսկել բոլոր սարքերը մեկ հարթակից։ Կարող եք միացնել կամ անջատել ահազանգը, տեսնել տեսախցիկների կենդանի հոսքը և ստանալ ծանուցումներ վտանգի մասին։

questions.question: Why are laser control systems effective?
questions.answer: Մեր հավելվածը թույլ է տալիս վերահսկել բոլոր սարքերը մեկ հարթակից։ Կարող եք միացնել կամ անջատել ահազանգը, տեսնել տեսախցիկների կենդանի հոսքը և ստանալ ծանուցումներ վտանգի մասին։

questions.question: Can I manage systems in multiple locations at the same time?
questions.answer: Մեր հավելվածը թույլ է տալիս վերահսկել բոլոր սարքերը մեկ հարթակից։ Կարող եք միացնել կամ անջատել ահազանգը, տեսնել տեսախցիկների կենդանի հոսքը և ստանալ ծանուցումներ վտանգի մասին։
